channel.title: The Sims 2 Help
channel.description:
Hello,
I have The Sims 2, and all of the expansions except the latest, and maybe Seasons, not sure. Anyways, I had to recover windows, and I lost all of my registry info, so I can no longer play the game. I also am not sure where some of the expansion pack cds are, and I really do not want to have to download them. Seeing as I already have all the game data, could anyone who has the game perhaps give me their registry key [this isn't illegal I think, because I DID buy the game], or just show me the template for it/expansions? Thanks Justis

item.title: The Sims 2 Help
item.dc:creator: @cooper cooper
item.description:
@cooper wrote:

Okay, thank you very much

Read full topic

item.title: The Sims 2 Help
item.dc:creator: @bowserjr2 Bowser jr
item.description:
@bowserjr2 wrote:

[quote=“cooper, post:5, topic:207522”][quote author=R.I.P RSC link=topic=273525.msg2238761#msg2238761 date=1211558039]
The cd key’s are on the manuals in the cd cases. You either are very stupid or lying.
[/quote]
I said registry keys, not cd keys.
Also, omit the cd keys if you would like. I can take a picture of the cds that I haven’t lost if you want, and I have lost a lot of the cases as well. So I am neither stupid, nor lying :P[/quote]

[quote=“cooper, post:5, topic:207522”][quote author=R.I.P RSC link=topic=273525.msg2238761#msg2238761 date=1211558039]
The cd key’s are on the manuals in the cd cases. You either are very stupid or lying.
[/quote]
I said registry keys, not cd keys.
Also, omit the cd keys if you would like. I can take a picture of the cds that I haven’t lost if you want, and I have lost a lot of the cases as well. So I am neither stupid, nor lying :P[/quote]

Here are the Registy Keys, you maybe must Edit them.

Read full topic

@cooper wrote:

R.I.P RSC:

The cd key’s are on the manuals in the cd cases. You either are very stupid or lying.

I said registry keys, not cd keys.
Also, omit the cd keys if you would like. I can take a picture of the cds that I haven’t lost if you want, and I have lost a lot of the cases as well. So I am neither stupid, nor lying

item.title: The Sims 2 Help
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

Be careful guys, registry keys nearly always have the CD keys with it (Which is what you bought the game for).

So giving out the registry key may mean your CD key gets stolen.

Read full topic
